weekly_top_story.headline: UN General Assembly demands immediate return of forcibly transferred Ukrainian children by Russia
weekly_top_story.summary: The UN General Assembly has overwhelmingly demanded that Russia unconditionally return all Ukrainian children who have been forcibly taken or deported amid the ongoing war, highlighting significant humanitarian concerns and global diplomatic tensions.

stories.headline: US President Trump says Putin wants to end the Ukraine war after Moscow talks
stories.summary: Following recent negotiations in Moscow, US President Donald Trump expressed optimism that Russian President Vladimir Putin seeks to end the Ukraine conflict, despite the talks concluding without an agreement.

stories.headline: Roadside bomb kills 3 police officers in northwestern Pakistan amid security alerts
stories.summary: A powerful roadside bomb targeting a police vehicle killed three officers in Pakistan’s northwest, marking the third such attack in recent days and underscoring ongoing regional security challenges.

stories.headline: Russia’s parliament approves key military pact strengthening defense ties with India
stories.summary: Ahead of President Vladimir Putin’s visit to India, Russia’s lower house approved the Reciprocal Exchange of Logistic Support agreement to bolster military cooperation between the two countries.
